summary: THE FENDER ON A 1998 FEATHERLITE CAR TRAILER FELL OFF WHILE DRIVING.  *NLM   DESIGN FLAW-AS THE REMOVABLE FENDER  SHOOK ON THE TRAILER SIDE,  IT TORE, CRACKED, AND BECAME LOOSE, AND THEN CAME COMPLETELY OFF THE TRAILER.  (HELD BY 3 SPRINGS)  THE MANUFACTURER STATED THERE WAS NO PROBLEM, THE DEALER STATED THAT IT WAS A DESIGN FLAW AND HAD WELDED THE FENDER CONTINUOUSLY.  (CAR TRAILER 1997)   *SCC  *JB
